name: Blood Bank
description:
Blood Bank is a management game in which you operate Count Dracula's new blood bank business. Keep bringing in blood to keep the boss happy, but be sure to take care of your customers or you may have to deal with an angry mob.

Uploaded as a game jam submission but I hope to add a few more features in time.  Was focusing more on coding and design practice, so kept the art to a bare minimum. Please message me if you find any bugs!

A submission to the Scream Lite game jam, theme "Profit."
